Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have the highest energy efficiency among various power generators.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of components for cube shaped micro tubular SOFC bundle

Sentencas: However, SOFCs generally have problems regarding to heat stress due to the heating cycle during cell operation, especially quick start-up/shut-down and the size of SOFC systems, which limit their application use.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of components for cube shaped micro tubular SOFC bundle

Sentencas: Micro tubular SOFCs are expected to be a solution to these problems because they are considered to be robust for repeated cycling under rapid changes in cell operating temperatures.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of components for cube shaped micro tubular SOFC bundle

Sentencas: If highly dense micro tubular SOFC stacks become available, it will accelerate development of SOFC systems, as well as increase a variety of applications.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of components for cube shaped micro tubular SOFC bundle

Sentencas: Our study aims to fabricate compact and high power SOFC bundles, which are composed of tubular SOFCs with the diameter of sub-millimeters.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of components for cube shaped micro tubular SOFC bundle

Sentencas: In this study, as the first stage of the development, processing technologies of tubular SOFCs and cube shaped cathode matrices were examined.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of components for cube shaped micro tubular SOFC bundle

Sentencas: Micro tubular SOFCs were fabricated using extrusion and co-firing techniques.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of components for cube shaped micro tubular SOFC bundle

Sentencas: The tubular SOFCs were then, arranged in the cathode matrices, which were piled up to be a cube shaped bundle.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of components for cube shaped micro tubular SOFC bundle

Sentencas: Each component of the cube shaped micro tubular SOFC bundle (cube) will be discussed in detail.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of components for cube shaped micro tubular SOFC bundle
